name: Strad Consulting Group
tag_list: private-placement-memorandum, ppm, business-plan, writer, hedge-fund, investment-fund, prospectus, offering-document
overview:
Strad Consulting Group specialize in creating business plans and writing private placement memorandums for companies and hedge funds.

Strad provides business and finance advisory services to small to medium sized companies. Area of focus is in creating business plans, writing Reg D private placement memorandums, formation & corporate structure, and general business management consulting. They work closely with entrepreneurs from their initial stage of development through the funding process to their next stage of expansion.
